LanguageData.BlocksSandstoneReinforced.label: 强化沙石块
LanguageData.BlocksSandstoneReinforced.description: 块状的沙石。沙石是一种相对柔软易碎的岩石。
LanguageData.BlocksGraniteReinforced.label: 强化花岗岩块
LanguageData.BlocksGraniteReinforced.description: 块状的花岗岩。花岗岩是一种极硬的岩石。
LanguageData.BlocksLimestoneReinforced.label: 强化石灰岩块
LanguageData.BlocksSlateReinforced.label: 强化板岩块
LanguageData.BlocksSlateReinforced.description: 块状的板岩。板岩是一种难看易碎的岩石。
LanguageData.BlocksMarbleReinforced.label: 强化大理石块
LanguageData.BlocksMarbleReinforced.description: 块状的大理石。大理石是一种较软，美丽的岩石，因易于雕塑而出名。
